text: The 1908 Virginia Cavaliers football team represented the University of Virginia in the 1908 college football season. Led by first year coach Merritt Cooke Jr., the team went 7-0-1 and were one of two teams given the mythical title of Southern champion. ==Schedule== ==References== Virginia Category:Virginia Cavaliers football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Virginia Cavaliers football
title: 1908 Virginia Cavaliers football team
